short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: removes the bad ui change and lets you hide the user bar by default and show it when you want

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This super awesome extension allows you to remove the bad bad UI update from TWITCH DOT TV!
Simply install the extension and wow! userbar gone! you want it back??? press the button beside the chat settings! so amazing!
